#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

main(){
	int q=0;
	int test=0;
	cin>>test;
	int rt=test;
	while(test--){
		int n=0,i=0,k=0;
		cin>>n;
		int arr1[n];
		int arr2[n];
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			arr1[i]=0;
			arr2[i]=0;
		}
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>arr1[i];
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin>>arr2[i];
		}
		
		sort(arr1,arr1+n);
		sort(arr2,arr2+n);
		reverse(arr2,arr2+n);
		int count=0;
		for(k=0;k<n;k++){
			count=count+(arr1[k]*arr2[k]);
		}
		
			cout<<"Case#"<<rt-test<<": "<<count;
		
		
	}

	
	return 0;
}
